title: How to Start the Day off Right

steps.title: Wake up early so that you can live an hour more.
steps.content: Wake up early so that you can live an hour more. This means giving yourself plenty of time to awaken, stretch and get ready. Waking up with just enough time to rush out the door is stress-inducing and not a good start to your day. Instead, go to bed early enough to allow you to awake refreshed and with time to do everything at a good, even pace. [1] X Expert Source Erin Conlon, PCC, JD Executive Life Coach Expert Interview. 31 August 2021. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Do some simple physical exercises to boost your energy.
steps.content: Do some simple physical exercises to boost your energy. It is a great way to kick-start your metabolism. This will help you to be more productive and effective in your activities for today. [3] X Research source Make sure that you don't over train straight away: you don't want to faint or feel exhausted.

steps.title: Cleaning up is one of the most important things to do in a morning, with or without exercising.
steps.content: Cleaning up is one of the most important things to do in a morning, with or without exercising. [4] X Research source If you can shower, then take a hot shower; [5] X Research source if you can't wash, at least wash your face in a bowl of very cold water to wake you up. [6] X Trustworthy Source American Academy of Dermatology Professional organization made of over 20,000 certified dermatologists Go to source

steps.title: If you dress in things that make you feel good, chances are you will feel that way.
steps.content: If you dress in things that make you feel good, chances are you will feel that way. Choose warm colors like yellows and reds (lose the black if possible). Try this for a couple of mornings and soon your whole wardrobe will change.

steps.title: It is always a good way to eat healthy food to start your day.
steps.content: It is always a good way to eat healthy food to start your day. This will give you the energy needed to kick start your day. [7] X Research source Be sure to drink water so you feel refreshed and stay hydrated. [8] X Expert Source Erin Conlon, PCC, JD Executive Life Coach Expert Interview. 31 August 2021.

steps.title: Select a playlist that consists of happy songs, the ones that give you an energy boost and cause you to soar.
steps.content: Select a playlist that consists of happy songs, the ones that give you an energy boost and cause you to soar.

steps.title: Take time to write your goals/priorities for today.
steps.content: Take time to write your goals/priorities for today. It will not take much of your time. It's a good way to start the day knowing what goals you'd like to meet and planning ahead will also teach you how to manage your time effectively. This way, you can avoid becoming overwhelmed by tasks because you already have set out what you want to achieve. If you pray, say a prayer. Ask for guidance throughout your daily activities and count your blessings rather than ranting about the things you don't have. Praying will also increase your faith and will give you fulfillment. Meditation can be a good option if you enjoy it. Set aside a space of 20 minutes to meditate before your day begins. [9] X Research source If you don't pray or meditate, consider setting aside some quiet time for reflection about the day ahead and the direction you're following in life. It can be a good way to start the day with purpose. Plan out your next day the night before so you don't have to stress about anything when you wake up. [10] X Expert Source Erin Conlon, PCC, JD Executive Life Coach Expert Interview. 31 August 2021.

steps.title: Before leaving the house, don't forget to make yourself good.
steps.content: Before leaving the house, don't forget to make yourself good. When you make your appearance good, it will help you to have a positive outlook. It will help you to improve your confidence and make yourself more trustworthy. [11] X Research source

steps.title: If possible walk to where you need to be, especially if it is early in the morning, nothing is better than walking around the streets when there is no-one around.
steps.content: If possible walk to where you need to be, especially if it is early in the morning, nothing is better than walking around the streets when there is no-one around. Or, walk to work, school or wherever you're headed. [12] X Trustworthy Source Harvard Medical School Harvard Medical School's Educational Site for the Public Go to source

steps.title: There is no other way of putting it the only way to start your day right is to be happy.
steps.content: There is no other way of putting it the only way to start your day right is to be happy. As soon as you wake up, tell yourself "today is a good day". Try it one morning and see the effect. Have positive intentions for the day, to better yourself and the lives of those around you. [13] X Trustworthy Source National Health Service (UK) Public healthcare system of the UK Go to source If you have a tough day ahead, say: "Today is a good day and I can do this." Aim to be the reason someone smiles today. Or, many someones!
